feed.title: Vd Thatte’s Blog
feed.subtitle: My semi-private blog. A place to jot down thoughts, practice writing and (maybe) rant about things. Thanks for visiting, hope I was able to teach you something new and interesting :)

entry.title: Best Advice I’ve recieved so far for my startup

link.title: Best Advice I've recieved so far for my startup

entry.content:
Launch Fast and Iterate

Talk to Users all the time

What’s the biggest obstacle? solve it asap

Take advice from people who have done it before (with a grain of salt)

advice from anybody else is usually shit - especially if they don’t ask you enough questions

entry.title: A semester without glasses.
entry.content:
Getting into uncomfortable situations has been a great contributing factor to my growth as a person and a leader. Here’s a time I put myself in an uncomfortable situation and I think it helped me a bit.

A few months ago, I accidently stepped on my glasses and broke them.

I was contemplating getting a new pair for a while now. It was almost two years since I had gotten an eye-checkup and a new pair of glasses.

I knew Warby Parker would ship glasses pretty quickly. So, before getting an eye-checkup, I decided to wait for a week and live without glasses. I had grown so dependent on them, just like I’ve grown extremely dependent on Coffee. And I wanted to try and not depend on them so much.

So this was my great opportunity to live life a little dangerously.
entry.summary: Getting into uncomfortable situations has been a great contributing factor to my growth as a person and a leader. Here’s a time I put myself in an uncomfortable situation and I think it helped me a bit.
